content.text: Hi, I'm a runner who likes listening to rap music. Do you like rap music?
Hey, I'm a musician who also likes rap music. What are some of your favorite artists?
I like listening to all kinds of rap music, but my favorite artists are Kendrick Lamar, J. Cole, and Childish Gambino.
I love Kendrick Lamar and J. Cole! I've never listened to Childish Gambino though. What are some of your favorite songs by him?
My favorite Childish Gambino songs are "Redbone" and "This Is America". They're both so catchy and fun to listen to.
I'll have to check those out! I'm always looking for new music to listen to.
I'm glad! I hope you like them.
Thanks! I'm sure I will.
So, what kind of music do you play?
I'm a musician who plays the piano and guitar. I also sing.
That's awesome! I can play the piano a little bit, but I'm not very good at it.
No worries! It takes a lot of practice to get good at playing the piano.
Yeah, I know. I've been trying to learn for a while now, but I'm still not very good.
Just keep practicing and you'll get better. I believe in you!
Thanks! I appreciate the encouragement.
No problem! So, what do you do for work?
I'm a software engineer.
That's cool! I've always been interested in software engineering, but I'm not sure if I'm smart enough to do it.
You're probably smarter than you think. Software engineering is a lot of fun, and it's a great career.
Thanks! I'll have to look into it more.
You should! I think you'd be good at it.
Thanks for the encouragement
